How to copy pages from other repositories

https://stackoverflow.com/questions/59408320/github-action-to-copy-a-file-from-one-repo-to-another Probably the best action to start with: https://github.com/marketplace/actions/copy-anywhere-action

check out both repositories under different paths: https://github.com/actions/checkout

literally do a file copy of one into the other

check it back in
